REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1594 reute d f BC-PHH-<PHH>-BUYS-TWO-DE 03-23 0045

TEXT.TITLE: PHH <PHH> BUYS TWO DESIGN FIRMS
TEXT.BODY: PHH Group Inc said it acquired two design firms for undisclosed terms. In 1986, the two firms, Neville Lewis Associates of New York and Walker Associates Inc of L.A., produced 15.6 mln dlrs in total fees. Reuter
